articles.author: Alex Wickham, Ellen Milligan
articles.title: UK Calls Time on Brexit Years and Vows Closer Ties With EU - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Britain is no longer the country that voted for Brexit and vowed to build a closer relationship with the European Union.
articles.content:
Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Britain is no longer the country that voted for Brexit and vowed to build a closer relationship with the European Union.
Appearing on stage Saturday alongside Europe… [+167 chars]
